snippet.title: Sigil of the Magi - Official Trailer [PC]
snippet.description:
Sigil of the Magi blends roguelite deckbuilding with turn-based combat for a deep tactical experience. Navigate a world full of dangers and mystique as you craft your deck, obtain relics, and prepare your party of champions for any challenges ahead!

Coming soon to Steam. 

--

▸ Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1781960/Sigil_of_the_Magi/?utm_source=youtube
▸ Come say hi on Twitter: https://twitter.com/sigilofthemagi
▸ Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/XCVew3K
